subject: Human Growth Hormone
Football
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Rodney Harrison said Friday night that he had been suspended for four games for using a prohibited substance, which is believed to be human growth hormone, but insisted he had never taken steroids.
snippet: Rodney Harrison said Friday night that he had been suspended for four games for using a prohibited substance, which is believed to be human growth hormone, but insisted he had never taken steroids.
